verses.verse: Now in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>, on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4428>same<s%>, when the king's <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1881>decree<s%> drew <S%H5060>near<s%> to be put in <S%H6213>execution<s%>, on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H7663>hoped<s%> to have <S%H7980>rule<s%> over <S%H2015>them<s%>, (whereas it was turned to the <S%H3064>contrary<s%>, that the Jews had <S%H7980>rule<s%> over them that hated <S%H8130>them<s%>,)

the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, to <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> on such as <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H7451>hurt<s%>: and no <S%H376>man<s%> could <S%H5975>withstand<s%> <S%H6440>them<s%>; for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of them was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> upon all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

And all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%>, and the <S%H323>satraps<s%>, and the <S%H6346>governors<s%>, and <S%H6213>they<s%> that did the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5375>business<s%>, helped the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>; because the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> was fallen upon <S%H5307>them<s%>.

For <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> was <S%H1419>great<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> went <S%H1980>forth<s%> throughout all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%>; for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H1980>waxed<s%> greater and <S%H1419>greater<s%>.

And the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> with the <S%H4347>stroke<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with <S%H2027>slaughter<s%> and <S%H12>destruction<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> what they <S%H7522>would<s%> unto them that hated <S%H8130>them<s%>.
And in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.
And <S%H6577>Parshandatha<s%>, and <S%H1813>Dalphon<s%>, and <S%H630>Aspatha<s%>,
and <S%H6334>Poratha<s%>, and <S%H118>Adalia<s%>, and <S%H743>Aridatha<s%>,
and <S%H6534>Parmashta<s%>, and <S%H747>Arisai<s%>, and <S%H742>Aridai<s%>, and <S%H2055>Vaizatha<s%>,

the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%>, the <S%H3064>Jew<s%>'s <S%H6887>enemy<s%>, <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H961>they<s%>; but on the spoil they <S%H7971>laid<s%> not their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of those that were <S%H2026>slain<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%>, The <S%H3064>Jews<s%> have <S%H2026>slain<s%> and <S%H6>destroyed<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace<s%>, and the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%>; what then have they <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces<s%>! Now what is thy <S%H7596>petition<s%>? and it shall be <S%H5414>granted<s%> <S%H1246>thee<s%>: or what is thy request <S%H5750>further<s%>? and it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%>, If it <S%H2896>please<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, let it be <S%H5414>granted<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that are in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4279>to-morrow<s%> also according unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1881>decree<s%>, and let <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H8518>hanged<s%> upon the <S%H6086>gallows<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> it so to be <S%H6213>done<s%>: and a <S%H1881>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%>; and they <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H2001>Haman<s%>'s <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> also of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%>; but on the <S%H961>spoil<s%> they <S%H7971>laid<s%> not their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And the <S%H7605>other<s%> <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> for their <S%H5315>lives<s%>, and had <S%H5118>rest<s%> from their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> of them that <S%H8130>hated<s%> them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; but on the <S%H961>spoil<s%> they <S%H7971>laid<s%> not their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

This was done on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>; and on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of the same they <S%H5118>rested<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>.

But the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> assembled <S%H6950>together<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> day <S%H702>thereof<s%>, and on the fourteenth <S%H2568>thereof<s%>; and on the fifteenth day of the same they <S%H5118>rested<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>.

Therefore do the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> of the <S%H6521>villages<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6519>unwalled<s%> <S%H5892>towns<s%>, <S%H6213>make<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%> a day of <S%H8057>gladness<s%> and <S%H4960>feasting<s%>, and a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and of <S%H4916>sending<s%> <S%H4490>portions<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>.

And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> unto all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> that were in all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, both <S%H7138>nigh<s%> and <S%H7350>far<s%>,

to <S%H6965>enjoin<s%> them that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar<s%>, and the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8141>same<s%>, yearly,

as the <S%H3117>days<s%> wherein the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> had <S%H5117>rest<s%> from their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and the <S%H2320>month<s%> which was <S%H2015>turned<s%> unto them from <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, and from <S%H60>mourning<s%> into a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>; that they should <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, and of <S%H4916>sending<s%> <S%H4490>portions<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, and <S%H4979>gifts<s%> to the <S%H34>poor<s%>.
And the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6901>undertook<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> as they had <S%H2490>begun<s%>, and as <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> had written unto <S%H3789>them<s%>;

because <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%>, the <S%H91>Agagite<s%>, the <S%H6887>enemy<s%> of all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, had <S%H2803>plotted<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H5307>them<s%>, and had cast <S%H6332>Pur<s%>, that is the <S%H1486>lot<s%>, to <S%H2000>consume<s%> <S%H6>them<s%>, and to destroy them;

but when the matter <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, he <S%H559>commanded<s%> by <S%H5612>letters<s%> that his <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>device<s%>, which he had <S%H2803>devised<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, should <S%H7725>return<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>, and that he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> should be <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows<s%>.

Wherefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> these <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6332>Purim<s%>, after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H6332>Pur<s%>. Therefore because of all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H107>letter<s%>, and of that which they had <S%H7200>seen<s%> concerning this <S%H3602>matter<s%>, and that which had come unto <S%H5060>them<s%>,

the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> <S%H6965>ordained<s%>, and <S%H6901>took<s%> upon <S%H2233>them<s%>, and upon their seed, and upon all such as <S%H3867>joined<s%> themselves unto <S%H5674>them<s%>, so that it should not fail, that they would <S%H6213>keep<s%> these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> <S%H2165>thereof<s%>, and according to the appointed time <S%H8141>thereof<s%>, every year;

and that these <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> and <S%H6213>kept<s%> <S%H1755>throughout<s%> every <S%H1755>generation<s%>, every <S%H4940>family<s%>, every <S%H4082>province<s%>, and every <S%H5892>city<s%>; and that these <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%> should not <S%H5674>fail<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, nor the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of them <S%H5486>perish<s%> from their <S%H2233>seed<s%>.

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail<s%>, and <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%>, <S%H3789>wrote<s%> with all <S%H8633>authority<s%> to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> this <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H107>letter<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> unto all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>, to the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%>, with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>,

to <S%H6965>confirm<s%> these <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%> in their appointed <S%H2165>times<s%>, according as <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew<s%> and <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> had <S%H6965>enjoined<s%> <S%H6965>them<s%>, and as they had ordained for <S%H5315>themselves<s%> and for their <S%H2233>seed<s%>, in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H6685>fastings<s%> and their <S%H2201>cry<s%>.
And the <S%H3982>commandment<s%> of <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6965>confirmed<s%> these <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H6332>Purim<s%>; and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%>.
